Coconut_Creek.Coral Springs Center for the Arts:
The Coral Springs Center for the Arts is an arts center and former community center in Coral Springs, Florida. The facilities include a theater and the Coral Springs Museum of Art, which features changing exhibits of works by nationally-recognized artists and Florida artists.


== History ==
During a community visioning exercise in the City of Coral Springs in the early 1980s, the participants indicated that there was a need for a community center to host meetings and events, as well as serve as a hub for recreational activities.
